SamPy.astronomy.metals.gallazzi¶

SamPy.astronomy.metals.gallazzi(h=0.7)¶

Scale stellar masses with h. n.b. masses in file are for H0=70 so no scaling is required if using Hubble constant 70.

Parameters:
  • h (float) – Hubble parameter to scale to

return: Stellar masses :rtype: a list of NumPy arrays
